name: Rewind Day
description:
It's Rewind Day. Defeat the wizard, or live your life in an endless loop.

WASD to move.

Left Mouse to attack once you pick up the sword.

 ---------------------------------------------------

I ran out of time for any sound.

please comment any feedback or bugs you find, thanks.

This is my first game jam game. I plan to update it and make this perfect, as soon as I'm allowed to do so.

Issues and Bugs:

  • I forgot to make the house and boss level walls collidable. whoops. if you walk outside of the boss level walls, you are destroyed and have to reload the page.
  • Enemy attack colliders are a bit off and a few pixels bigger than the sprite in some directions.
